MaintPag.title: Welcome to my website!
MaintPag.herotext: I create custom websites that are clean, fast, and tailored for artisans, freelancers, and small businesses. My approach? A simple, clutter-free design that highlights what matters most: Your work.

home.title: Welcome to my website!
home.herotext: I create custom websites that are clean, fast, and tailored for artisans, freelancers, and small businesses. My approach? A simple, clutter-free design that highlights what matters most: Your work.

about.title: aurelienj.
about.content: Since my teenage years, the web has fascinated me. I started by creating blogs and websites for friends and family, then later built one for the last store where I worked. After ten years as a bicycle mechanic, I realized my passion could become my profession, and I fully embraced web development.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.text: Need to improve an existing website, create a new one, or just have a question? Share your project with me — I'm here to help.

UiUxLab.title: My projects
UiUxLab.subTitle: Digital Experiences & Interactive Solutions
UiUxLab.content: A showcase of my digital creations, built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. I focus on combining clean design and efficient functionality to create intuitive and engaging user experiences
UiUxLab.p98: The next project is under construction and will be available soon
UiUxLab.p15: An intuitive and fluid to-do list designed to showcase my development skills. Easily add, validate, or delete tasks with a responsive and dynamic interface.
UiUxLab.p22: A fast and intuitive login system with a single field and smooth animations for a modern, efficient experience
UiUxLab.p32: An intuitive input field paired with a smooth send button, designed to provide a fast and elegant user experience
UiUxLab.p42: Have fun with this mini memory game, find the pairs!
